General.Name: Baticim Bati Anadolu Cimento Sanayi AS
General.Description: Batiçim Bati Anadolu Çimento Sanayii Anonim Sirketi operates in the cement industry in Turkey and internationally. It provides Portland cement clinkers and potassium silicate cements; Portland, sulphate resistant Portland, Portland compound, and pozzolanic cements; and aggregate and cement bypass dust products. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

4.Name: Mr. Mesut  Çaglayan
4.Title: Investor Relations Unit Director, Internal Audit Mang. and Shareholder Relations Unit Director
